h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mind Core Locations
content: The next Mind Core is automatically given to you upon finishing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge and defeating the Yellow Wind Sage.

The next Mind Core is automatically given to you upon finishing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge and defeating the Yellow Wind Sage.
